sentences.en: Already he had instinctively started forward to help her.
sentences.cn: 他本能地走上几步,去帮她的忙.

sentences.en: As he leaned towards her she instinctively recoiled.
sentences.cn: 他向她靠近,她本能地往后缩.

sentences.en: Both ladies instinctively gathered themselves into more tidy posture.
sentences.cn: 两位女士本能地恢复了端庄的姿态.

sentences.en: He knew instinctively that something was wrong.
He knew instinctively where he would find her.
sentences.cn: 他本能地知道在哪儿能找到她.

sentences.en: He thought how like her expression was then, to what it had been when she looked round at the Doctor - that night - and instinctively dropped her hand and turned away.
sentences.cn: 他想，她现在的表情跟她那天夜里环视四周，最后望着医生时的表情是多么相像啊，于是他就本能地放下她的手，走开了。

sentences.en: His jaw instinctively closed, and his gray eyes narrowed.
sentences.cn: 他本能地闭紧嘴巴, 灰色的眼睛收缩成一条线.

sentences.en: I felt instinctively negative toward Stevenson.
sentences.cn: 我对史蒂文森却本能地有反感.

sentences.en: Instinctively I knew he was the game warden.
sentences.cn: 凭直觉,我知道他是个护猎员.

sentences.en: Instinctively, she felt a desire to imitate it.
sentences.cn: 本能地, 她就想模仿那种姿态.

sentences.en: Jane instinctively knew all was not well with her 10-month old son.
sentences.cn: 简凭直觉知道她10个月大的儿子情况不对劲。

sentences.en: She shut up her heart instinctively against her aunt.
sentences.cn: 她不禁对这位姨母有些寒心了.

sentences.en: The pilot instinctively maneuvered to avoid them.
sentences.cn: 飞行员本能地驾机避开他们。

sentences.en: They instinctively gathered themselves into more tidy postures.
sentences.cn: 她们本能地恢复了端庄的姿态.

sentences.en: We all once cried so instinctively, so shamelessly.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人当初都曾经为这样的本能大声地 、 毫不害羞地哭过.

sentences.en: We answer this question instinctively and quite quickly because we have some intuitive sense of the whole experience.
sentences.cn: 我们本能而迅捷地回答这个问题，因为对于整个经历，我们有一些直觉的感受。

sentences.en: We know instinctively, just as beekeepers with their bees that misfortune might overtake us if the important events of our lives were not related to it.
sentences.cn: 我们本能地懂得, 正如养蜂人对待蜜蜂一样,如果不把我们生活中的重大事件告诉这条河,我们就会遭到厄运的袭击.

sentences.en: We know instinctively, just as bookeepers with their bees that misfortune might overtake us if the important events of our lives were not related to it.
sentences.cn: 正如养蜂人与蜜蜂的关系一样,我们本能地懂得如果我们不把自己生活中重大事件告诉它的话,不幸的事情就会袭击我们.
出于本能，我们会怎么做？
